title: Old Man Mountain FLIP (Cargo) Cages and Hemlock Bags
content:
Old Man Mountain launches its first cargo cages, the FLIP Cages. The FLIP attachment system, which stands for Fast Lock in Place, is seamlessly incorporated into these injection-molded nylon cargo cages. FLIP Cages are meant to pair with the all-new Old Man Mountain Hemlock bags, which feature interlocking quick-release hardware. Let’s check out more below…

Paired with a bag using Old Man Mountain’s new FLIP system, FLIP Cages allow for a fast, secure, and rattle-free attachment. Old Man Mountain’s first FLIP-compatible offering is the Hemlock, a 7-liter, waterproof bag that can be attached with a simple hook of the feet and a 90-degree turn of the handle to confidently lock it in place.

Hemlock Specs

  • 7 Liter capacity per bag
  • Fully welded and waterproof construction made from TPU fabric
  • HypalonⓇ reinforcements are more abrasion-resistant and provide structure to the bags
  • PFAS/PFC-free materials
  • Roll top enclosure is easy and reliable
  • Lightweight
  • Hemlock = 333 g (each), 666 (!!!!) grams per pair.
  • FLIP Cage weight: 93 g (each), 139 g with optional foot.
  • RRP: Hemlock and cages (pair) $175

FLIP Cages

  • Detachable Cargo Foot
  • Strap slots
  • 215 mm x 62 mm & 93 g x cage without Cargo Foot
  • 240 mm x 62 mm & 139 g x cage with Cargo Foot
  • RRP (pair) $80

 

This system is rated at 9.9 lbs (4.5 kgs) per side. The bottom half of the bags are made from durable and abrasion resistant Hypalon where they are likely to encounter rocks and brush while the top are made from a lightweight ripstop for better compression while also reducing weight.

See more on the Fast Lock in Place Cages and Hemlock Bags at Old Man Mountain.

While Old Man Mountain loves its bag designs, it knows they serve a specific need and will not be for everyone. This is why Old Man Mountain is making FLIP cages and hardware available as an OEM product to any interested bag makers, big and small. If you are a bag maker and would like to offer FLIP cages and hardware to your customers, you can learn more at Old Man Mountain.
